message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great opportunity to purchase this fantastic product. I think you'll really love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, I'm not quite willing to meet you at $120. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make a profit. How about we meet at $160?
I understand you need to make a profit, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go as low as $140?
I'm willing to consider your offer, Bob. However, I think the product's value is worth a bit more than that. I'm willing to meet you at $145, but that's as low as I can go.
I understand your concerns about the product's value, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me halfway between our previous offers at $137.50?
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to consider your offer, but I still think I can do better than that. How about we meet at $142.50? That's as close to the middle as I'm willing to go.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still not comfortable going above $130. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?

I'm starting to think we're getting close to the bottom line, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $140, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that. It's a good price, but I'm hoping you can see the value in the product.
I understand your concerns, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers at $135. Would you be willing to consider that?

I'm starting to think we're really close, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $138, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that. I'm hoping you can see the value in the product and be willing to meet me at this price.
I understand your persistence, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you at $132. Would you be willing to consider that?
